clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Indicated as an adjunct for the prevention and treatment of wound sepsis in patients with second and third degree burns

contraindications.disease: Acute oral toxicity LD50 in rat is 10001 mg kg
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Silver sulfadiazine has broad antimicrobial activity It is bactericidal for many gram negative and gram positive bacteria as well as being effective against yeast Silver sulfadiazine is not a carbonic anhydrase inhibitor and may be useful in situations where such agents are contraindicated

incompatibilities.description: The serum concentration of Magnesium can be decreased when it is combined with Silver sulfadiazine
Silver sulfadiazine may decrease the excretion rate of Benzylpenicillin which could result in a higher serum level
